title: Who cries more, males or females? - Quora

response.answer_text: It just really depends on the people involved. Stats show that on average women cry twice as much as men. However, with my sister and my girlfriend, we are probably about even on how much we cry.

Well, based on my experiences, Both male and females are human beings. Everyone cries when something sad happen to them. However, females being innocence they can't bear things more. So, they usually cries more as compared to male.
